title: Mobile Learning-Based Field Observation Inquiry Process in Ecology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Ecological Theory and Field Survey Methodology
context.additional_context: Field-applicable training program for language practitioners. Inquiry-based learning enhanced through observation worksheets and mobile feedback in smartphone-centric constrained environments

learning_goals: Learners can systematically collect ecological field data using a three-stage worksheet (guided observation-independent observation-extended inquiry)
Immediate feedback provided in mobile environments reduces observational errors by over 30%
By the end of the course, over 70% of learners can autonomously select and execute extended inquiry topics

resources: Field Observation Support Materials (Plant/Animal Specimen Kit)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
